item.title: Java 12 no Debian Buster
item.description: Adicionar repositório. cat <<EOF > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/java-12-debian.list deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/linuxuprising/java/ubuntu bionic main deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/linuxuprising/java/ubuntu bionic main EOFapt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys EA8CACC073C3DB2A apt-get update apt-get install oracle-java12-installer Referências How to Install Java 12 on Debian 10/9/8 via PPA
